title: volume-label-probability
description:
FIND FREQUENCY OF VOLUME LABELS.

This command outputs a set of soft ROIs, one for each label in the input, where the value is how many of the input maps had that label at that voxel, divided by the number of input maps.

probability-out.description: the relative frequencies of each label at each voxel

exclude-unlabeled.description: don't make a probability map of the unlabeled key

label-maps.description: volume label file containing individual label maps from many subjects
